  • メソッド
org.apache.hadoop.io

インタフェース Stringifier<T>

  • 型パラメータ:
    T - the class of the objects to stringify
    すべてのスーパーインタフェース:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    DefaultStringifier

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Stable
public interface Stringifier<T>
extends Closeable
    Stringifier interface offers two methods to convert an object to a string representation and restore the object given its string representation.

    • メソッドの概要

      メソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      void close()
      Closes this object.
      T fromString(String str)
      Restores the object from its string representation.
      String toString(T obj)
      Converts the object to a string representation

    • メソッドの詳細

      • toString

        String toString(T obj)
                throws IOException
        Converts the object to a string representation
        パラメータ:
        obj - the object to convert
        戻り値:
        the string representation of the object
        例外:
        IOException - if the object cannot be converted

      • fromString

        T fromString(String str)
             throws IOException
        Restores the object from its string representation.
        パラメータ:
        str - the string representation of the object
        戻り値:
        restored object
        例外:
        IOException - if the object cannot be restored

      • close

        void close()
           throws IOException
        Closes this object.
        定義:
        close インタフェース内 AutoCloseable
        定義:
        close インタフェース内 Closeable
        例外:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
